question: I've had an ultrasound and follow-up blood tests to measure PCH (?) levels again...I scanned the ultrasound which reported nodules (adenomas?)  Won't see Endo for another month.  I have diabetes, thinning hair, bones ache sometimes and have had high blood calcium.  Can hyperparathyroidism prompt hard-to-treat diabetes?  All my life, I have had undiagnosed PCOS...  This is just thrilling, hey?  Any insight?  Thanks!
title: Hyperparathyroid & Diabetes etal
